name: key-ti
description: Key-ti - AWS Session Key Auto Renewal Tool

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/renderer.html dist/ && cp build/key-logo.png dist/ && sed -i '' '2d' dist/renderer.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && electron-builder && npm run post-dist
scripts.post-dist: cd release && rm -rf 'Key-ti.app' Key-ti-1.0.0 Key-ti-1.0.0-distribution.zip && unzip -q 'Key-ti-1.0.0-arm64-mac.zip' && mkdir -p Key-ti-1.0.0 && mv 'Key-ti.app' Key-ti-1.0.0/ && cp ../install.sh Key-ti-1.0.0/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp ../README.md Key-ti-1.0.0/ 2>/dev/null || true && zip -r -q Key-ti-1.0.0-distribution.zip Key-ti-1.0.0 && rm -rf Key-ti-1.0.0 && echo '' && echo '✅ 배포 파일 생성 완료: release/Key-ti-1.0.0-distribution.zip' && echo ''

extendInfo.NSAppleEventsUsageDescription: Key-ti needs to open browser for SAML authentication.
